term.title: areic

item.text: Attribute to a physical quantity obtained by division by area. Areic charge is the charge on a surface divided by the surface area.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 957. 'Glossary of terms in quantities and units in Clinical Chemistry (IUPAC-IFCC Recommendations 1996)' on page 962 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668040957)

term.citation: Citation: 'areic' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.A00432

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
